hadiths.text: Abu Bakrah said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) on the Minbar, and Al-Hasan was with him. He would turn to the people sometimes and turn to him (Al-Hasan) sometimes, and he said: 'This son of mine is a leader (Sayyid) and Allah may make peace between two large groups of Muslims through him

chapter.ara-name: مُخَاطَبَةُ الإِمَامِ رَعِيَّتَهُ وَهُوَ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam Addressing His Followers When He Is On The Minbar
